title: What Happens When Disney Runs Out of Remakes
description:
This video is sponsored by Nebula. Get a GREAT deal on Nebula now: https://go.nebula.tv/captainmidnight
Watch Tale Foundry's Worldsmiths: https://nebula.tv/worldsmiths
The Little Mermaid came out recently and was...another remake to add to the pile. In this video, I go over what happens when Disney runs out of Lion Kings.
Music by Epidemic Sound (http://www.epidemicsound.com)
